summary: The great Dragonborn cut off the tail of Aludin and attached it to an Elven gold rod in order craft this spear.
descriptionHtml:
Alduin Halberd/Spear- ElSte17

Update -- Just realized that I only doubled the resolution of the textures, when I could have quadrupled it.  I will retexture this again when I get the chance.  Right now I\'m quite busy working on my Flyable Dragon Races mod.

The great Dragonborn cut off the tail of Aludin and attached it to an Elven gold rod in order craft this Halberd.

Two handed weapon. Textures aren\'t great but I plan to get much better at texturing.

Install:  Use NMM 
or merge the Data folder with the Data folder in your skyrim directory and check the .esp file

Craft it at any forge, under the steel menu, for free.
author: ElSte17
